media.label: BT21 Characters, Tata a humanoid character with a large heart for a head, RJ an alpaca, Chimmy a yellow puppy, and Koya a blue koala are popping out of a party hat along with confetti
celebration, bunny discharging confetti party popper, MiMi and NeKo
silly, birthday cake on top of bunny balloon
